intake.label: website-intake
intake.task: Validate incoming PRD against template requirements. Check for: title, problem statement, solution, acceptance criteria, priority. If incomplete, list what's missing. If complete, summarize and mark APPROVED for routing.

design.label: website-design
design.task: Review approved PRD and current site patterns (knowledge/site-patterns.md). Propose specific design changes with code snippets. Focus on UX/UI improvements that match the existing design system.

developer.label: website-dev
developer.task: Implement approved design changes. Create feature branch, make changes, commit with descriptive messages, create PR. Include before/after screenshots if possible.

qa.label: website-qa
qa.task: Review PR for: code quality, accessibility, mobile responsiveness, visual consistency, broken links. Report issues or approve for Mike's review.

workflow: intake → design → developer → qa → [MIKE APPROVAL] → deploy
